name: stretchy-spaces
description: Allows you to change how wide your indentation spaces are.

stretchySpaces.targetIndentation.description: How many spaces do you wish your indentation was? Default is 4. Must be 0 or above.

stretchySpaces.includedLanguages.description: For which languages Stretchy Spaces should be activated. When empty will use for all languages.

stretchySpaces.excludedLanguages.description: For which languages Stretchy Spaces should be deactivated. When left empty will ignore.

stretchySpaces.alignAsterisks.description: Leave at normal width a space before an asterisk in an indentation, to preserve the alignment of the asterisks in /* ... */ comments where each line begins with an asterisk.

stretchySpaces.updateDelay.description: The delay in ms until the editor gets updated.

enumDescriptions: Only enabled for diff editors when in side-by-side mode
Only enabled for diff editors when in side-by-side mode - includes a hack-y fix for when toggling between side-by-side and inline modes
stretchySpaces.diffEditor.description: When Stretchy Spaces should be enabled in diff editors
